TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Takidis, title = Takidis, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Takidis} }

S.FORM: alang Takidis ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Tayimari go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 157 buwan, 371 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 57% kyan ku 212 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 43% kyan ku 159 hi nya. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Takidis hya' ga Tjavualji. tay mkyahu' na Takidis hya' ga Sasaljak. tay mkyahu' na eki' hya' ga Takidis. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Takidis ga ungat kyokay. hasisyo qalang Takidis ga maki 1 hasisyo. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Takidis ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Takidis ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Tayimari go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 157 bowan, 371 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 57% kyan ko 212 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 43% kyan ko 159 hi nya. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Takidis hya' ga Tjavoalji. tay mkyaho' na Takidis hya' ga Sasaljak. tay mkyaho' na eki' hya' ga Takidis. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Takidis ga ongat kyokay. hasisyo qalang Takidis ga maki 1 hasisyo. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Takidis ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
